text: Amir Shamsaei (, born 21 March 1967) is an Iranian retired futsal player and current coach.https://en.mehrnews.com/news/115691/Amir-Shamsaei-nominated-for- Best-Club-Coach-title ==Personal life== He is the older brother of Vahid Shamsaei. == Honours == * AFC Futsal Club Championship ** Champions (1): 2015 (Tasisat Daryaei) * Iranian Futsal Super League ** Champion : 2013–14 (Dabiri Tabriz) == References == Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian men's futsal players Category:Iranian futsal coaches
title: Amir Shamsaei
